review:
Dr.Sachin is very good he makes us understand the problem and then suggests the medication.
He guides the patients about the medicine and the side effects if in case we miss the medicine.
Very helpful, patient listener . Prompt advice and prescribed medicines and future course of action. Very satisfied with the meeting

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother aged 68 years had a cough since many days and she was very uncomfortable and  i visited this clinic and met Dr Sachin
Based on the explanation doctor understood and prescribed few medicines along with test like 2d echo .pft ,cbc
*** ********* ****** ****** **** ** ***** *** ***** ********** *** ***** *********** 
I went with reports next day and heart report was gud and we both were happy. Pulmonary report had a bit of changes and as per doctors advise few more tablets were given and my mom is very completely fine now .
Right test ,right diagnosis is required which met my expectations with Dr Sachin and am extremely thankful

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My sister was suffering from Dengue and was consulting Dr Sachin. We were panicked when platelets count dropped to 80000 on day7. But doctor said there is nothing to worry and assured us that situation will improve in next two days and it's not required to get admitted though we were insisting on it. As he said the situation improved and platelets count started increasing from day8 and reached 2.5l in 2-3 days.
Moreover he was available on call, whatsapp to answer our queries.
we are grateful to Dr Sachin.
Doctor is approachable. But he is peripheral. If you get to know the indication of the problem, please approach specialist instead of Sachin physician, because anyway he is going to do that.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: * ***** ***** ****** ***** *** ******** ** ** **** ** **** Didn't ask any questions related to health or any pre existing diseases which I have one. Didn't ask what reports readings were. Didn't explain the medicines. **** ****** ******* ******* ************* When consultant back after couple of days. Gave me the list of around 10-12 expensive tests for which I got in doubt again and I consultant another doctor for the same ***** ****** *** **** * ***** **** ** ** ******* ***** **** ***** ******* **** *********** **** *** **** ****** *** ** ** ** ** *** ** ****** **** ** *** ******* Very unsatisfied.
reply_text: Hi..just saw your feedback..if you are so much interested to take steroids without severe symptoms you are most welcome to take according to your second opinion doctor and pathologist. Those test help you to assess the severity. And mind you that is a basic test for this disease. And I really don‚Äôt want patients to be on unnecessary drugs. Anyways get well soon with your second opinion. Very unsatisfied patient that I have ever met.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Respiratory tract infection,Stomach pain and stomach upset,Food Poisoning,
review:
He is very patient, listens to complete problems and symptoms reported by the patients, thoroughly examines the patient and asks further questions to understand the problem in depth.
He is very genuine and does not advice the patient to get unnecessary tests done.
Follow-ups with him are rare, because the primary treatment almost always cures the problem. And incase a follow up is required, he is very prompt at giving advice. 
He also doesn't charge exorbitant consultation fees.
Would definitely recommend Dr. Sachin

I booked the consultation for my relative in other city from my account, so she couldn't contact doctor.Doctor was so kind that he called me, asked for delay, understood my problem,and himself called the patient, instead of the other doctor who cancelled the appointment)Thank you üôè‚ú®üôè‚ú® for your time and consideration

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Doctor Sachin for my daughter as she was suffering from headache, bodyache . He listen to my daughter first and then diagnose as viral. He gave medicines for viral fever. Today is the 3rd day she is Ok. Thanks Doctor, I was very much worried.
I would recommend to consult Dr. Sachin.
